channel.title: Authors on Jongse Park
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Jongse Park

item.description: Starting December 2019, I joined Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) as an assitant professor, and will be a faculty member of Computer Architecture and System Laboratory (CASys)! I am very much looking forward to working with talented students on exciting projects. If you're interested in joining my research group, please apply to the graduate program of School of Computing at KAIST, and contact me via email introducing yourself. Research Statement Teaching Statement
